thread.title: Jay Parini remembers friend Gore Vidal in “Empire of Self”
thread.title_full: Jay Parini remembers friend Gore Vidal in “Empire of Self” - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Tony Bravo
title: Jay Parini remembers friend Gore Vidal in “Empire of Self”
text:
Jay Parini wrote “Empire of Self: A Life of Gore Vidal.” Jay Parini wrote “Empire of Self: A Life of Gore Vidal.”
Since author and self-appointed intellectual conscience of America Gore Vidal died in 2012, there have been a stream of investigations of the groundbreaking writer’s legacy. Jay Parini wrote “Empire of Self: A Life of Gore Vidal.” Jay Parini wrote “Empire of Self: A Life of Gore Vidal.”
Since author and self-appointed intellectual conscience of America Gore Vidal died in 2012, there have been a stream of investigations of the groundbreaking writer’s legacy.
